Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.05.2014 GB SCR18894 BDH020A: Updates if no existing DEBTOR_CLIENT was found: Copied all not mentioned fields
from the selected DEBTOR_CLIENT row
04.03.2014 GB SCR18700 Currency recalculation: Replaced GSET_YESNO (165) = Y by GSET_YESNO (384) = Y
10.02.2014 JH SCR18700 BDH020J: Added update of DEBC_GRADE_AMOUNT

12.08.2013 SH SCR18337 BDH020A: Added update DEBB_DATLASTPOSVERIFPHONE; BPH020J7 Extended
BID707 argument list
24.12.2012 GB SCR17606 BDH020A: Changed value of update the DEBC_VERIFALLOWED

10.10.2012 GB SCR17606 Changed value of update the DEBC_VERIFALLOWED from v.BDC009.PO.DEBCFIELDS to blank in the BDH020A

19.03.2012 JH SCR17204 BDH020J Part 3: Added DEBC_REINSURANCECONTRACT and DEBC_REINSURANCEGRADE

Part 2: Reinsurance at ING ComFin level

and GB002 by GB902

DEBH level, has to be only done in first part of step 1

on 14.3.2005 WJ SCR7943 change text

unique/nonunique test on DEBC

//14-06-2004 JP SCR #6371 submitter note: replace Test 4 in BDH020B

- for details

-- Get DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT uses in BDH020A for storing debtor client
-- Get DEBH_ISBUYINGGROUP uses in BDH020Q to check if debtor heller could be
-- deleted
-- Get HUSR_DEPT_CODE used in BDH020F
-- Only if DHDU_STATUS = 0 perfrom the following steps, otherwise end program
-- immediately
-- Set status = 1 to indicate that the row is handled
-- Select old debtor clients
-- Uses as trigger to perform BDH020J Part 3
-- Uses in the BDH020A
-- BDH020K Delete client debtor (--> last selected debtor)
-- Debtor Heller related updates
... copy the remarks on debtor heller level
-- BDH020K Delete client debtor (--> previous selected debtor)
-- Reset variables
-- Debtor client related updates
... in case of GSET_YESNO (165) = Y the debtor client updates are performed in
BDH005DH, so modules BDH0202A- K have to be skipped
-- BDH020K Delete client debtor
... store values, current debtor will be deleted in R.P. if next debtor will
be selected or in T.S. for the last selected debtor client
(Could not be done here, because we have to delete the debtor with
BDC305 and if we do it in R.S. the it's possible that MAGIC or the
database lost the pointer and the program crashed.)
-- Reset variables
-- Initial update, uses for further handling in BDH020
-- Test 1 Does new debtor already exists with the same DEBC_DEBC
-- Test 2 Does new debtor already exists with DEBC_DEBC = 0
-- Test 3 Does new debtor already exists while DEBC_DEBC = 0 of old debtor
-- Debtor client exists
... perform update on related DEBB row
... if automatic collection is possible for old debtor and not for the new
debtor, then the automatic collection details have to be copied to the new
debtor (selected in test 1 -3)
-- Debtor client does not exists, store a new one
-- Uses as trigger in BDH020J Part3
-- Turn job to MSGW, if there exist no new DEBC_NO, which will be set in the
previous tests, see above
Test 1 Does new debtor already exists with the same DEBC_DEBC (DEBH not unique)
Test 1 Does new debtor already exists with the same DEBC_DEBC (DEBH unique)
-- Debtor exists, use debtor number of existing debtor for further handling
-- Test 2
Does new debtor already exists with DEBC_DEBC = 0
Or DEBC_DEBC = ''
-- Debtor exists, use debtor number of existing debtor for further handling
-- Test 3 Does new debtor already exists while DEBC_DEBC = 0 of old debtor
@This task has to check if there exists ONLY ONE row in DEBC, in this case the
selected DEBC_NO can be used for further handling in BDH020
(INFO: See end task condition, max. 2 loops will be performed)
-- ONLY if one debtor was selected, he can use for further handling in BDH020
-- Obtain DEBTOR CLIENT BATCH from old DEBTOR CLIENT
-- Store new DEBTOR CLIENT BATCH for new DBETOR CLIENT
-- Obtain new debtor client (selected in test 1 -3)
-- If automatic collection is possible for the old debtor but not for the new
debtor (selected in test 1 -3), copy automatic collection details from
old debtor to the new debtor
-- Perform limit updates on the new debtor client, if no credit limit present
-- B1: Perform tests on existing credit limits
... init triggers
-- Test1: One of the debtors has own judgement
... do not overwrite the HELLER limit
//replace former Test 4 to Test 2 SCR #6371 14-06-2004
-- Test2: One of the debtors has own judgement
... overwrite the own jugement limit by HELLER limit
//replace former Test 2 to Test 3 SCR #6371 14-06-2004
-- Test2: Last decided limit is more important
//replace former Test 3 to Test 4 SCR #6371 14-06-2004
-- Test3: Highest limit is more important
. The test on creditlimits has to be done in the same currency -> ADMN_CURRENCY
B2:Perform limit updates on the new debtor
B7. The credit limit of the old debtor has to be deleted always
-- Becomes TRUE if the limit of the old debtor was copied to the new debtor,
-- uses as trigger in BDH020J Part3
-- Check if total creditlimits of DEBH have to be calculated --> Step B6

Header.Description: B7. Delete limit on old debtor

Text.val: -- B7. Delete limit on old debtor client
-- Perform limit updates on the new debtor client, if no finance limit present
-- B1: Perform tests on existing credit limits
... init trigger with TRUE
-- Test1: Last decided limit is more important
-- Test3: Highest limit is more important
. The test on creditlimits has to be done in the same currency -> ADMN_CURRENCY
C2:Perform limit updates on the new debtor
C7. The finance limit of the old debtor has to be deleted always
-- Check if total creditlimits of DEBH have to be calculated --> Step C6

Header.Description: C7. Delete limit on old debtor

Text.val: --C7. Delete limit on old debtor client
-- Finally book off the invoices and update the debtor and client with BPH250
... the new batch id is also used in BDH020J6 - Move history

Header.Description: Check if invoices must be move

FormName.valUnicode: Check if invoices must be move

Text.val: -- Select invoices which have to moved from old to new debtor
-- Add rows to BPIV for the old debtor client
-- Add rows to BPIV for the new debtor client
Final updates

FormName.valUnicode: Check if invoices must be move

Text.val: -- Select remarks from old debtor client for deletion
-- Write one note that the duplicate debtor was merged
-- Check if there already exists a row in DCRM for the new debtor client
... conversion from UTF-16 LE to UTF-16 BE
... Copy notice from old debtor to new debtor
... Add notice from old debtor to the current of the new debtor
... conversion from UTF-16 BE to UTF-16 LE
-- Check if there already exists a row in DCRM for the new debtor client
... conversion from UTF-16 LE to UTF-16 BE
... add new notice if a notice is not already present
...add new notice if a notice is already present
... conversion from UTF-16 BE to UTF-16 LE
-- If a DEBTOR_CLIENT_DUNNING row exists for the new debtor client then stop
BDH020G, else check if there exists DEBTOR_CLIENT_DUNNING rows for the old
debtor, in this case the DCDU rows must be moved to the new debtor
-- Move DCDU rows to new debtor client
-- Update all remaining rows in MQ on debtor heller level
-- Update all remaining rows in MQ on debtor heller level
-- Delete last selected DCMO row, if old and new debtor were merged
-- Delete previous selected DCMO row, if old and new debtor were merged
-- Reset variables
-- If there exists no DCMO row for the new debtor client, then update old
DCMO_DEBC_NO with the new debtor client number
... else Step3 Merge old debtor and new debtor
... (new debtor fields)
-- Store old debtor key fields for DCMO which has to be delete, see R.P. and T.S
-- Update all remaining rows in DRIH on debtor heller level
-- Perform update only if no row exists, otherwise we get a duplicate key
-- Perform update only if no row exists, otherwise we get a duplicate key
-- Select banaccounts for old debtor client
-- Check if the same bankaccount already exists for the new debtor client
-- Check if there already exists one bankaccount for the new debtor client where
DCBA_USEFORAUTOMATICCOLL = TRUE, then
DCBA_USEFORAUTOMATICCOLL of the old debtor client where DCBA_DEBC_NO
has to be updated with the new debtor client number, has to be updated with
'N', because only one bankaccount could be used for automatic collection
-- Update DCBA_DEBC_NO of old debtor client with the new debtor client
number, if the bankaccount not already exists for the new debtor client
-- If there already exists one bankaccount for the new debtor client where
DCBA_USEFORAUTOMATICCOLL = TRUE, then
DCBA_USEFORAUTOMATICCOLL of the old debtor client where DCBA_DEBC_NO
has to be updated with the new debtor client number, has to be updated with
'N', because only one bankaccount could be used for automatic collection
-- If a DEBTOR_CLIENT_DUNNINGADDRESS row exists for the new debtor client then
stop BDH020J3, else check if there exists DEBTOR_CLIENT_DUNNINGADDRESS rows
for the old debtor, in this case the DCDA rows must be moved to the new debtor
-- Move DCDA rows to new debtor client
-- If a DEBTOR_CLIENT_LEGAL_COLL row exists for the new debtor client then
stop BDH020J5, else check if there exists DEBTOR_CLIENT_LEGAL_COLL rows
for the old debtor, in this case the DCLC rows must be moved to the new debtor
-- Move DCLC rows to new debtor client
-- Check if DCLV row already exists for the new debtor to avoid duplicate keys
errors
-- Do not perform the update if this leads to a duplicate key errors
-- Select remarks from old debtor heller for deletion
-- Check if there already exists a row in DHRM for the new debtor heller
... conversion from UTF-16 LE to UTF-16 BE
... Copy notice from old debtor to new debtor
... Add notice from old debtor to the current of the new debtor
... conversion from UTF-16 BE to UTF-16 LE
-- Check if there already exists a row in DHRM for the old debtor heller
-- Check if there already exists a row in DHRM for the new debtor heller
... conversion from UTF-16 LE to UTF-16 BE
-- Prepare text which has to be written to DHRM_NOTICE
-- Add notice for the old debtor
... if there is no notice
... if there is still a notice exists
-- Add notice for the new debtor
... if there is no notice
... if there is still a notice exists
... conversion from UTF-16 BE to UTF-16 LE

Header.Description: BDH020P Copy text to new debto

Text.val: -- Perform update only if no row exists, otherwise we get a duplicate key
-- Part 1: Old debtor was legal owner
-- Part 2: Old debtor was commercial owner 1
-- Part 3: Old debtor was commercial owner 2
-- PI.Trigger_Selection = 3 ==> DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH
-- PI.Trigger_Selection = 4 ==> DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1
-- PI.Trigger_Selection = 5 ==> DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH2
(F.i. The numbers are related to the specified indexes, see expression of index)
-- If debtor hellers were updated, then also the debtor heller has to be updated
-- Legal owners are selected
- Write changes to DB_HISTORY
- If min. one debtor heller was updated, the new debtor heller has to be also
updated, see T.S.
-- Commercial owners 1 are selected
- Write changes to DB_HISTORY
- If min. one debtor heller was updated, the new debtor heller has to be also
updated, see T.S.
-- Commercial owners 2 are selected
- Write changes to DB_HISTORY
- If min. one debtor heller was updated, the new debtor heller has to be also
updated, see T.S.
-- Legal owner of new debtor heller = 0
- Write changes to DB_HISTORY
-- Commercial owner 1 of new debtor heller = 0
- Write changes to DB_HISTORY
-- Commercial owner 2 of new debtor heller = 0
- Write changes to DB_HISTORY
-- Check existing debtor client
-- Check existing debtor client for buying group, only if debtor heller is
buying group
-- Delete Heller debtor if no debtor client exists for this debtor
